metadata.title: CVE-2022-21831 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A code injection vulnerability exists in the Active Storage >= v5.2.0 that could allow an attacker to execute code via image_processing arguments.

notes.note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
